source.body: This PBS solution does NOT have to be sterile, but make sure it is clearly marked.

source.description:
1X saline (PBS without the phosphate) at
  • no need to pH adjust, it's not a buffer
  • no need to sterilize as the mild acid elution is not done under sterile conditions
